title: FUD on the line as telcos contemplate the cost of quitting Chinese kit
summary_full: The Cybersecurity Act review aims to make European telcos rip and replace kit from 'high risk' suppliers – but how many billions will it cost them?
summary_public: The Cybersecurity Act review aims to make European telcos rip and replace kit from 'high risk' suppliers – but how many billions will it cost them?
